Condoleezza Rice seemed to be the one top advisor who spoke that way, he writes, "but it was not clear to me whether she was encouraging the Dick Cheney to use rhetoric about democracy or whether it was originating with the Dick Cheney ." Chris Bryant, who believes he may have been a victim of the phone hackers, said Friday he welcomed the decision to re-examine the case, adding that it should not have been closed last month. The evidence that this goes far deeper than one rotten apple has continued to stack up, and so a fresh pair of eyes looking at the case is very welcome, he said.
